title: （已自行解决）服务端自动关闭
author: absent-cyd
txt_content:
本帖最后由 absent-cyd 于 2018-7-28 02:54 编辑 
[21:31:58] [Server thread/INFO]: [FurnitureLib] FurnitureLib load 9 Objects from: MySQL Database
[21:31:58] [Server thread/INFO]: [FurnitureLib] FurnitureLib have loadet 36 in 00:00.277
[21:31:58] [Server thread/INFO]: [FurnitureLib] FurnitureLib have purged 0 Objects
[21:32:01] [Server thread/INFO]: FurnitureLib load Models(33): Barrels,BlackBoard,CactusPlant,Camera,CampChair,CandyCane,Catapult,Chair,ChristmasTree,Crossbow,Door,Fence,GraveStone,Hammock,HumanSkeleton,Lampa,Lantern,Log,MailBox,SchoolChair,SchoolTable,SleepingBag,SnowGolem,Sofa,Sunshade,TV,Table,Tall_Chair,Tent1,Trunk,WaxCandle,WirdowwScarecrow,electricchair[m
[21:32:01] [Server thread/INFO]: [0;32;22mFurniture load finish :)[m
[21:32:01] [Server thread/INFO]: ==========================================[m
[21:32:01] [Server thread/INFO]: [DiceFurniture] Enabling DiceFurniture v3.2.1.4
[21:32:04] [Server thread/INFO]: Server permissions file permissions.yml is empty, ignoring it
[21:32:04] [Server thread/INFO]: Done (197.028s)! For help, type "help" or "?"
[21:32:04] [Server thread/INFO]: Stopping server
[21:32:04] [Server thread/INFO]: [DiceFurniture] Disabling DiceFurniture v3.2.1.4
[21:32:04] [Server thread/INFO]: [FurnitureLib] Disabling FurnitureLib v1.9.9.4
[21:32:04] [Server thread/INFO]: [FurnitureLib] ==========================================
[21:32:04] [Server thread/INFO]: [FurnitureLib] Furniture shutdown started
[21:32:04] [Server thread/WARN]: [AutoSaveWorld] Plugin FurnitureLib attempted to establish connection socket://localhost:3306 in main server thread
[21:32:04] [Server thread/WARN]: Fri Jul 27 21:32:04 EDT 2018 WARN: Establishing SSL connection without server's identity verification is not recommended. According to MySQL 5.5.45+, 5.6.26+ and 5.7.6+ requirements SSL connection must be established by default if explicit option isn't set. For compliance with existing applications not using SSL the verifyServerCertificate property is set to 'false'. You need either to explicitly disable SSL by setting useSSL=false, or set useSSL=true and provide truststore for server certificate verification.复制代码如上，看上去没有任何严重错误，一切看起来都如此完美，可惜服务器在完成启动后自动关闭，真是造化弄人。虽然我做过ctrl+c这种蠢事，但是这次没有。
在启动完成之后，它就自动关闭，一切如同正常的关闭进程一样，仿佛什么都没有做过，然后默默重启。真是省心的服务端啊。
spigot，版本1.12.2，java8、内存足够。
需要额外信息请戳。

replies.author: absent-cyd
replies.txt_content:

[21:31:56] [Server thread/WARN]: [AuthMe] Please check your database settings in the config.yml file!
[21:31:56] [Server thread/WARN]: [AuthMe] Could not create data source: [SQLException]: Error writing file './muranloft/#sql-5a0_9bdfd.frm' (Errcode: 28 - No space left on device)
[21:31:56] [Server thread/WARN]: [AuthMe] Aborting initialization of AuthMe: [IllegalStateException]: Error during initialization of data source
[21:31:56] [Server thread/WARN]: [AuthMe] THE SERVER IS GOING TO SHUT DOWN AS DEFINED IN THE CONFIGURATION!
[21:31:56] [Server thread/INFO]: [AuthMe] Waiting for 0 tasks to finish
[21:31:56] [Server thread/INFO]: [AuthMe] AuthMe 5.4.0-b1877 disabled!复制代码
问题已解决。
